title: Social Leadership Design Strategies Through Learning from Failure

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Leadership Theory and Understanding of Elementary School Education Systems
context.additional_context: A course for corporate education managers/leaders focusing on analyzing failure cases in elementary education program design and deriving improvement strategies.

learning_goals: Analyze failed learning design cases to identify at least three major failure factors
Redesign social leadership education programs by applying failure-based learning strategies
Achieve over 80% implementation feasibility for revised design proposals through peer evaluation
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
